title: What is Money?
description: Learn the basics of money with the Wise Wizard
npcGreeting: Welcome, young adventurer! I am the Wise Wizard of the Financial Realm. Today, we'll discover the magic of money! Are you ready to learn?
npcFarewell: Well done, brave adventurer! You've taken your first step toward financial wisdom. Visit me again anytime!

questions.explanation: That's right! Money is a tool we use to buy things we need and want, like food, toys, and books.

choices.text: To buy things we need and want

questions.text: If you have 3 coins and earn 2 more, how many coins do you have?
questions.explanation: Excellent! 3 + 2 = 5 coins. Counting money is an important skill!

questions.text: Which is a smart thing to do with coins?
questions.explanation: Perfect! Saving coins for later is very smart. You can use them when you really need something!
